name: ixfx-highlight
description: Context aware syntax highlighting for ixfx.

ixfx-highlight.color.state.light.markdownDescription:
The color used to highlight `state` in light color themes.
Specified in CSS hex notation.

ixfx-highlight.color.state.dark.markdownDescription:
The color used to highlight `state` in dark color themes.
Specified in CSS hex notation.

ixfx-highlight.color.settings.light.markdownDescription:
The color used to highlight `settings` in light color themes.
Specified in CSS hex notation.

ixfx-highlight.color.settings.dark.markdownDescription:
The color used to highlight `settings` in dark color themes.
Specified in CSS hex notation.
